thread.title: Kentucky gran makes squirrel-proof bird feeder with Slinky | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kentucky gran makes squirrel-proof bird feeder with Slinky | Daily Mail Online

author: Alice Evans For Mailonline
title: Kentucky gran makes squirrel-proof bird feeder with Slinky | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Every time the pests tried to clamber up the Slinky to steal a morsel of food, the metal coil unravelled and sent them back down to the ground. This squirrel went hungry after Jan Siems Catron from Owensboro, Kentucky, attached a Slinky to her bird feeder to stop the critter from nabbing any tasty morsels Jan said: 'The squirrels tried to climb the pole for two days. 'After they fell off many times, they gave up.' Jan posted a video on Facebook to show off her innovative ploy - and was amazed when 35 million people viewed the clip. The triumphant grandmother added that some of the squirrels have learned to evade the Slinky by jumping from a nearby tree straight on top of the bird feeder. But Jan isn't too worried by this recent development. She said: 'If they land it, I let them stay on the feeder for a snack. 'I figure if they work that hard, they have earned it.' This nut-orious thief was no match for Jan's contraption, and gave up after several failed attempts to scale the pole Read more: Share or comment on this article 160
